Sixty is the passing mark. 甲队罚球连得二分。 Jiǎ duì fáqiú lián de èrfēn. Team A scored two successive points by free throws. 他今天考试得了一百分。 Tā jīntiān kǎoshì déle yībǎi fēn. He got full marks in today’s exam. 10 [for nonphysical things] one-tenth 七分成绩, 三分错误 Qī fēn chéngjì, sānfēn cuòwù 70 per cent achievements, 30 per cent mistakes 他已经有三分醉了。 Tā yǐjing yǒu sānfēn zuì le. He’s a bit tipsy already. 我的牙痛好了几分。 Wǒ de yátòng hǎo le jǐ fēn. My toothache has been partly relieved. 这消息使我多了一分希望。 Zhè xiāoxi shǐ wǒ duō le yī fēn xīwàng. The news raised my hopes a little.

preposition 1 in the interest of; for 为大多数人谋利益 Wèi dàduōshù rén móu lìyì work in the interests of the vast majority 2 because of 为胜利而欢呼 Wèi shènglì ér huānhū hail a victory 为我们的友谊干杯！ Wèi wǒmen de yǒuyì gānbēi! A toast to our friendship! 3 for the purpose of; for the sake of 为方便起见 wèi fāngbiàn qǐjiàn for the sake of convenience 不为名, 不为利 bù wèi míng, bù wèi lì seek no personal fame or gain 让我们为实现这一宏伟目标而共同努力。 Ràng wǒmen wèi shíxiàn zhè yī hóngwěi mùbiāo ér gòngtóng nǔlì. Let us strive together to attain this splendid goal. 4 to; towards 他为我送来一份请帖。 Tā wèi wǒ sòng lái yī fèn qǐngtiě. He’s sent me an invitation. 且为诸君言之。 Qiě wèi zhūjūn yán zhī. I’ll let you know. verb literary stand for; support

noun 1 expenses; outlay See 23655168家用jia1yong4家用;26009344零用ling2yong4零用 2 usefulness; use 没什么用 méishénme yòng rather useless 有点儿用 yǒudiǎnr yòng be of some use 3 (Yòng) a surname verb 1 use; employ; apply; consume 酒精常用作溶剂。 Jiǔjīng chángyòng zuò róngjì. Alcohol is often used as a solvent. 你会不会用计算机？ Nǐ huì bù huì yòng jìsuànjī？ Do you know how to operate a computer? 你应该把主要精力用在学习上。 Nǐ yīnggāi bǎ zhǔyào jīnglì yòng zài xuéxí shàng. You should devote your chief energies to your studies. 2 [usu. in the negative] need 不用担心。 Bùyòng dānxīn. Don’t worry. 不用开灯。 Bù yòng kāi dēng. There’s no need to turn on the light. 3 courteous eat; drink 请用茶。 Qǐng yòng chá. Won’t you have some tea, please? preposition with 用火烤 yòng huǒ kǎo roast over the fire 用手掰 Yòng shǒu bāi break with one’s hands 用水煮 yòng shuǐ zhǔ boil in water 用五十八秒钟跑完全程 yòng wǔshíbā miǎo zhōng pǎo wán quánchéng run the course in 58 seconds 用针刺麻醉做外科手术 yòng zhēncì mázuì zuò wàikē shǒushù employ acupuncture anaesthesia in surgery conjunction literary [usu. in letters] hence; therefore 用特函达。 Yòng tè hán dá. Hence this letter.

adverb only; just; merely 只剩一个了。 Zhǐ shèng yī ge le. There is only one left. 我只想问一个问题。 Wǒ zhǐ xiǎng wèn yī ge wèntí. I have just one question. 这只是个时间问题。 Zhè zhǐ shìge shíjiān wèntí. It is merely a question of time. 我们这车只能带三个人。 Wǒmen zhè chē zhǐ néng dài sān ge rén. We can only take three people in our car. 屋子里只老王一个人。 Wūzi lǐ zhǐ lǎo wáng yī ge rén. Old Wang was alone in the room. 只那块地就打了八百斤小麦。 Zhǐ nà kuài dì jiù dǎ le bābǎi jīn xiǎomài. That plot alone yielded 800 jin of wheat.

noun 1 biology species 本地种 běndì zhǒng endemic (or local) species 外地种 wàidì zhǒng exotic (or foreign) species 老虎是猫科的一种。 Lǎohǔ shì māo kē de yī zhǒng. The tiger belongs to the cat family. 2 race; stock See 23077888黄种huang2zhong3黄种;17052160白种bai2zhong3白种 3 branch; division; kind; sort; type 工种 gōngzhǒng work category; type of work (in production) 语种 yǔzhǒng languages; language type 4 seed; strain; breed 麦种 Mài zhǒng wheat seeds 这水稻是什么种？ Zhè shuǐdào shì shénme zhǒng？ Which variety of rice is this? 5 guts; grit 没种 méizhǒng gutless; cowardly See 35119104有种you3zhong3有种 measure word kind; sort; type 各种仪器 gèzhǒng yíqì all kinds of instruments 这种论调 zhèzhǒng lùndiào this sort of argument 一种现象 yī zhǒng xiànxiàng a phenomenon 四十种钢材 sìshí zhǒng gāngcái forty types of rolled steel 他有(一)种以前从未有过的感觉。 Tā yǒu yī zhǒng yǐqián cóngwèiyǒuguò de gǎnjué. He felt something he’d never felt before.

verb 1 work as; serve as; be 选他当组长 Xuǎn tā dāng zǔzhǎng elect him group leader 我长大要当飞行员。 Wǒ zhǎngdà yào dāng fēixíngyuán. I want to be a pilot when I grow up. 2 bear; accept; deserve 敢做敢当 gǎnzuògǎndāng dare to act and to take the consequences 我可当不起这样的夸奖。 Wǒ kě dāng bù qǐ zhèyàng de kuājiǎng. I just don’t deserve such praise. 3 direct; manage; be in charge of See 19645696当家dang1jia1当家 4 [as aux.] ought to; should; must 能省的就省, 当用的还是得用。 Néng shěng de jiù shěng, dāng yòng de háishi dé yòng. Save what you can, but use what you must. 5 literary hold back; block See 31200768螳臂当车tang2bi4dang1che1螳臂当车 adjective equal See 26675200门当户对men2dang1hu4dui4门当户对 preposition 1 in sb.'s presence; to sb.'s face 咱当着大家谈一谈。 Zán dāng zhe dàjiā tán yī tán. Let’s speak out in the presence of everyone. 2 just at (a time or place) 当莫扎特四岁时, 就开始写小步舞曲。 dāng mò zhā tè sì suìshí, jiù kāishǐ xiě xiǎobù wǔqǔ. When only four, Mozart was composing minuets. onomatopoeia sound of a gong or a bell 当当的钟声 Dāng dāng de zhōngshēng the tolling of a bell noun literary end 瓦当 wǎdāng eaves tile

conjunction 1 and; as well as 伟大而艰巨的任务 wěidà ér jiānjù de rènwu great and arduous task 2 and yet; but; while on the other hand 有其名而无其实 Yǒu qí míng ér wú qíshí in name but not in reality 你喜爱体育运动, 而我呢, 情愿看书。 Nǐ xǐ'ài tǐyù yùndòng, ér wǒ ne, qíngyuàn kàn shū. You like sports, while I’d rather read. 这里的气候有利于种小麦, 而不利于种水稻。 Zhèlǐ de qìhòu yǒulì yú zhòng xiǎomài, ér bù lìyú zhòng shuǐdào. The climate here is favourable to the growth of wheat but unfavourable to the growth of rice. 3 so that; in order to 不要因失败而灰心, 也不要因成功而骄傲。 Bùyào yīn shībài ér huīxīn, yě bùyào yīn chénggōng ér jiāo'ào. Don’t be discouraged by failure or get dizzy with success. 4 [with 由, 从, 自, etc.] to 由南而北 Yóu nán ér běi from south to north 自远而近 zìyuǎn'érjìn approach from a distance 由童年而少年, 而壮年 yóu tóngnián ér shàonián, ér zhuàngnián from childhood to teenage, then to middle age 5 [connecting an adverbial element to a verb] 匆匆而去 cōngcōng'érqù leave in haste 盘旋而上 pánxuán ér shàng spiral up 顺流而下 shùnliú'érxià go down the stream 6 [between a subject and a predicate expressing a condition, to be followed by a clause indicating result] if 作家而不深入群众, 就写不出好作品。 Zuòjiā ér bù shēnrù qúnzhòng, jiù xiěbuchū hǎo zuòpǐn. If a writer does not go deep among the masses, he cannot expect to turn out good writings.

noun behaviour; conduct 品行 pǐnxíng moral conduct 言行 yánxíng words and deeds verb 1 literary go; walk; travel 非洲之行 Fēizhōu zhī xíng a trip to Africa 日行百里 rì xíng bǎi lǐ cover a hundred li a day 日行三千步 rì xíng sānqiān bù walk three thousand steps a day (for exercise) 儿行千里母担忧。 Ér xíng qiān lǐ mǔ dānyōu. When children travel far from home, mothers never stop worrying. 2 be current; circulate 发行 fāxíng issue; publish; distribute; put on sale 3 do; perform; carry out 简便易行 jiǎnbiàn yìxíng simple and easy to do 4 [before a disyllabic verb, indicating the performance of some action] 即行通知 jí xíng tōngzhī notify sb. at once 另行安排 lìngxíng ānpái make separate arrangements 5 be all right; will do 没有铅丝, 用绳子也行。 Méiyǒu qiānsī, yòng shéngzi yě xíng. If there is no wire, a cord will do. 你替我到邮局跑一趟, 行吗？——行！ Nǐ tì wǒ dào yóujú pǎo yī tàng, xíng ma？ -- xíng! Would you run over to the post office for me? — OK! or All right! 在快车道上骑车可不行。 Zài kuàichēdào shàng qíchē kě bùxíng. Cycling along the motorway is not allowed. 咱们走着去, 行不行？ Zánmen zǒuzhe qù, xíng bù xíng？ Will it be all right if we go on foot? 6 (of medicine) take effect 感觉药性已行 Gǎnjué yàoxìng yǐ xíng feel that medicine is taking effect adjective 1 temporary; makeshift See 33510656行营xing2ying2行营;33511936行灶xing2zao4 行灶 2 capable; competent 不要认为只有自己才行。 Bùyào rènwéi zhǐyǒu zìjǐ cái xíng. Don’t think you’re the only capable one. 老王, 你真行！ Lǎo wáng, nǐ zhēn xíng! Lao Wang, you are really terrific (or something great)! 你看他干这工作行吗？ Nǐ kàn tā gàn zhè gōngzuò xíng ma？ Do you think he is up to it? adverb literary soon 别来行复四年。 Bié lái xíng fù sì nián. It is four years since we parted.

preposition 1 with; by means of 以守为攻 yǐ shǒu wéi gōng use defence as a means of offence 以市场为导向 yǐ shìchǎng wéi dǎoxiàng guided by the market; market-oriented 以天下为己任 yǐ tiān xià wéi jǐ rèn take the destiny of one’s country as one’s own responsibility 以质量求发展 yǐ zhìliàng qiú fāzhǎn strategy of development through quality 以姓氏笔画为序 yǐ xìngshì bǐhuà wéi xù in order of the number of strokes in their surnames 以我之长, 攻敌之短 yǐ wǒ zhī cháng, gōng dí zhī duǎn utilize our strong points to attack the enemy’s weak points 喻之以理 Yù zhī yǐ lǐ reason with sb.; try to make sb. see reason 赠以鲜花 zèng yǐ xiānhuā present sb. with a bouquet 2 according to 以此类推 yǐcǐlèituī on the analogy of this 以时启闭 yǐshíqǐbì open and close according to schedule 以到达先后为序 yǐ dàodá xiān-hòu wéi xù in order of arrival 3 because of 不以失败自馁, 不以成功自满 bù yǐ shībài zìněi, bù yǐ chénggōng zìmǎn not lose heart because of failure nor feel conceited because of success 何以知之？ Héyǐ zhī zhī？ How do you know? 4 literary at (a certain time); on (a fixed date) 我以三月一日返。 wǒ yǐ Sānyuè yī rì fǎn. I returned on March the first. conjunction 1 in order to; so as to 以示区别 yǐ shì qūbié so as to distinguish this from other cases 以应急需 Yǐ yìng jíxū in order to answer an urgent need 2 literary and; as well as 城高以厚。 Chéng gāo yǐ hòu. The city wall is high and thick. 淅沥以潇飒 Xīlì yǐ xiāo sà raindrops pattering and wind rustling preposition [before certain localizers to form compound localizers] 长江以北 Cháng Jiāng yǐ běi north of the Yangtze River noun abbreviation Israel 以军 yǐjūn Israeli army

verb literary go; leave for 由京之渝 Yóu jīng zhī yú leave Beijing for Chongqing 君将何之？ Jūn jiāng hé zhī？ Where are you bound for? pronoun literary 1 [in place of an objective noun or pronoun] 将如之何？ Jiāng rú zhī hé？ What is to be done? 影片情节十分悲惨, 观众无不为之感动。 Yǐngpiàn qíngjié shífēn bēicǎn, guānzhòng wúbù wèi zhī gǎndòng. The film was so sad that everyone was moved. 2 [in certain set phrases without definite designation] 手之舞之, 足之蹈之 Shǒu zhī wǔ zhī, zú zhī dǎo zhī dance with joy 我们三个人我最年长, 李次之, 张又次之。 Wǒmen sān ge rén wǒ zuì niánzhǎng, lǐ cìzhī, zhāng yòu cì zhī. Of the three of us, I am the eldest, Li is younger, and Zhang is the youngest. 3 this; that 之子于归。 Zhīzǐyúguī. The maiden goes to her future home. auxiliary 1 [between an attribute and the word it modifies] 宝中之宝 Bǎozhōngzhībǎo the treasure of treasures; the most precious 抱歉之至 bàoqiàn zhī zhì awfully sorry 得意之极 déyì zhī jí very pleased with oneself 感激之至 gǎnjī zhī zhì deeply grateful 三分之一 sānfēn zhīyī one-third 一水之隔 yīshuǐzhīgé separated only by a river 以我之长, 攻敌之短 yǐ wǒ zhī cháng, gōng dí zhī duǎn utilize our strong points to attack the enemy at his weak points 原因之一 yuányīn zhīyī one of the reasons 钟鼓之声 Zhōng-gǔ zhī shēng the sound of drums and bells 百分之八十 bǎifēn zhī bāshí eighty per cent 非常之需要 fēicháng zhī xūyào highly necessary 非常之正确 fēicháng zhī zhèngquè absolutely right 急群众之急 jí qúnzhòng zhī jí eager to meet the needs of the populace 五千年之久 wǔqiān nián zhī jiǔ as long as five thousand years 不胜荣幸之至 bù shèng róngxìng zhī zhì feel greatly honoured 我之所以讨厌他是因为他的嘴太贫。 Wǒ zhīsuǒyǐ tǎoyàn tā shì yīnwèi tā de zuǐ tài pín. I dislike him because he is too garrulous. 弦乐器是指琵琶, 二胡, 小提琴之类。 xiányuèqì shì zhǐ pípa, èrhú, xiǎotíqín zhī lèi. Stringed instruments refer to the pipa, erhu, and violin, etc. 2 literary [between the subject and the predicate in an S-P structure so as to make it nominalized] 如因势利导, 则如水之就下, 极为自然。 Rú yīnshìlìdǎo, zé rú shuǐ zhī jiù xià, jíwéi zìrán. If we guide the matter along their course of development, it will proceed as naturally as water flows downwards.

noun 1 square 这块板子是方的。 Zhè kuài bǎnzi shì fāng de. This is a square board. 2 mathematics involution; power 二的四次方是十六。 Èr de sì cì fāng shì shíliù. The fourth power of 2 is 16. 三的三次方是二十七。 Sān de sān cì fāng shì èrshíqī. The third power (or cube) of 3 is 27. 3 abbreviation (usu. 平方米或立方米) square or cubic (usu. square or cubic metre) 一方木材 yī fāng mùcái a cubic metre of lumber 铺地板十五方 pū dìbǎn shíwǔ fāng lay 15 square metres of floorboards 4 (Fāng) a surname adjective upright; honest See 20790528方正fang1zheng4方正 measure word [for square things] 三方图章 Sān fāng túzhāng three seals 一方手帕 yī fāng shǒupà a handkerchief noun 1 direction 东方 dōngfāng east 前方 qiánfāng ahead; in front 2 side; party 我方 wǒfāng our side 3 place; region; locality 远方 yuǎnfāng distant place noun 1 method; way 治疗有方 zhìliáo yǒu fāng treat with proper method 2 prescription 这方儿专治腰痛。 Zhè fāngr zhuān zhì yāo tòng. This prescription is especially good for backaches. adverb literary 1 just when; at the time when See 20781824方今fang1jin1方今 2 only; just 年方二十 Nián fāng èrshí be just twenty years old

noun 1 place 住所 zhùsuǒ dwelling place; residence 2 office; bureau; institute 指挥所 zhǐhuīsuǒ command post 3 dated troop station in the Ming Dynasty measure word [for houses, schools, hospitals, etc.] 两所学校 liǎng suǒ xuéxiào two schools 一所房子 Yī suǒ fángzi a house 这所医院 zhè suǒ yīyuàn this hospital auxiliary literary 1 [noun or pronoun＋所＋verb] a [with 的 to modify a noun] 我所认识的人 wǒ suǒ rènshi de rén the people I know 大家所提的意见 dàjiā suǒ tí de yìjian the opinions various people put forward b [with 的 as a noun] 他所说的未必确实。 Tā suǒ shuō de wèibì quèshí. What he says is not necessarily true. 我所知道的就这些。 Wǒ suǒ zhīdao de jiù zhèxiē. That’s all I know. c [as a noun without 的, esp. when the verb is monosyllabic] 所到之处 suǒdàozhīchù wherever one goes 所见所闻 suǒjiànsuǒwén what one sees and hears 尽我所能 jìn wǒ suǒ néng do all I can 据你所说 jù nǐ suǒ shuō from what you say 2 [所＋verb] a [with 的 to modify a noun] 所需的费用 suǒ xū de fèiyong necessary expenses 所用的方法 suǒ yòng de fāngfǎ the methods which are used b [with 的 as a noun] 所需的并不多。 Suǒ xū de bìng bù duō. What is needed is not much. 我们所考虑的正是这一点。 wǒmensuǒ kǎolǜ de zhèngshì zhè yīdiǎn. That’s just what we have under consideration. c [as a noun without 的, esp. in set phrases in which the verb is monosyllabic] 各尽所能 gèjìnsuǒnéng from each according to his ability 3 [为 or 被＋ noun or pronoun ＋所＋ verb, expressing a passive meaning] 为人所笑 wéi rén suǒ xiào be laughed at by other people 被表面现象所迷惑 bèi biǎomiàn xiànxiàng suǒ míhuo be misled by outward appearances 4 [所＋ verb used as the object of 有 or 无] a [as the object of 有] 有所创造 yǒusuǒ chuàngzào create something or other 有所准备 yǒusuǒ zhǔnbèi be prepared in some way or other b [as the object of 无, esp. in set phrases] 无所准备 wú suǒ zhǔnbèi need do nothing in preparation for it 无所用心 wúsuǒyòngxīn not give serious thought to anything
verb [after a verb plus 个] without end; non-stop 一天到晚忙个不了 yī tiān dào wǎn máng ge bùliǎo busy from morning till night 大雨下个不了。 Dàyǔ xià ge bùliǎo. The rain kept pouring down.

affix 1 [after personal pronoun or a noun referring to a person to form the plural] 工人们 gōngrén men workers 同志们 tóngzhì men comrades 女士们, 先生们 nǚshì men, xiānsheng men ladies and gentlemen 2 [in personification after a noun referring to an object or an animal to form the plural] 满天的星星们眨着眼睛。 Mǎn tiān de xīngxing men zhǎ zhe yǎnjing. All the stars were blinking. 奶奶管我们叫小燕子们。 Nǎinai guǎn wǒmen jiào xiǎoyànzi men. Grandma calls us “little swallows”. 3 [after the name of a person to mean people of the same kind, or to mean his or her associates] 希特勒们 Xītèlè men the likes of Hitler

verb 1 approve 认可 rènkě recognize 许可 xǔkě permit 2 a [as auxiliary] be willing to; be ready to 可干 kěgàn be willing to do hard work 可虚心接受意见 kě xūxīn jiēshòu yìjian be ready to listen to criticism with an open mind b dialect often; tending to 这几天可下雨。 Zhè jǐ tiān kě xià yǔ. It rained a lot these past few days. 北京可游的地方不少。 Běijīng kě yóu de dìfang bùshǎo. There are quite a few places worth visiting in Beijing. adverb literary about 年可二十 nián kě èrshí be aged about twenty 重可千斤 Zhòng kě qiān jīn weigh about a thousand jin preposition dialect [followed by 着] to the limit of; go as far as possible 可着嗓门儿哭 kě zhe sǎngménr kū cry at the top of one’s lungs (or voice) 就这么多钱, 你可着用吧。 jiù zhème duō qián, nǐ kě zháoyòng ba. You’ll have to make do with the money available. conjunction but; yet; however 劳动很艰苦, 可大家干劲十足。 Láodòng hěn jiānkǔ, kě dàjiā gànjìn shízú. It was hard work, but everybody went at it with a will. 都这么说, 可谁见过呢？ Dōu zhème shuō, kě shuí jiàn guò ne？ So they say, but who has ever actually seen it? adverb 1 colloquial [for emphasis] 你可来了！ Nǐ kě lái le! You’re here at last! 他可没说过这话。 Tā kě méi shuō guò zhè huà. He never saidthat. 你可不能粗心大意啊。 Nǐ kě bù néng cūxīndàyì a. You must not be careless. 2 [in a question for emphasis] 这话可是真的？ Zhè huà kě shì zhēn de？ Is that really true? 你可曾跟他谈过这个问题？ Nǐ kě céng gēn tā tán guò zhège wèntí？ Did you ever talk it over with him? verb fit; suit See 24967168可心ke3xin1可心;71220138可口儿ke3kou3r5 可口儿

affix 1 [added to some nouns or noun morphemes] 乱子 luànzi trouble; mess 帽子 màozi hat 胖子 pàngzi fat person 旗子 qízi flag 推子 tuīzi hair clipper 2 [added to certain measure words] 这档子事 zhè dàngzi shì this matter; this business 来了一伙子人。 Lái le yī huǒ zi rén. A group of people arrived. 我一下子想不起他的名字。 Wǒ yīxiàzi xiǎng bù qǐ tā de míngzi. I can’t recall his name at the moment.

preposition 1 [indicating time or place] in; on; at 生于上海 shēngyú Shànghǎi born in Shanghai 驰名于全世界 chímíng yú quánshìjiè be famous throughout the world; be of world renown 就学于北京大学 jiù xué yú Běijīng Dàxué study at Beijing University 来信于十五日收到。 Láixìn yú shíwǔ rì shōudào. This project is to be completed within three years. 第一次世界大战爆发于一九一四年。 Dì-yī cì shìjiè dàzhàn bàofā yú yī jiǔyīsì nián. The First World War broke out in 1914. 2 [indicating direction] toward; to 求助于人 qiúzhùyúrén ask people for help 热衷于集邮 rèzhōng yú jíyóu be keen on stamp collecting 3 [indicating giving or yielding to sb.] to; onto 腐朽的势力让位于新生的势力。 Fǔxiǔ de shìli ràngwèi yú xīn shēng de shìli. Decaying forces give way to new rising forces. 4 with regard to; concerning; to 有利于提高产量 Yǒulì yú tígāo chǎnliàng be conducive to higher yields 操之过急, 于事无补。 Cāozhīguòjí, yúshìwúbǔ. It would be of no avail to act with undue haste. 这样于你自己不利。 Zhèyàng yú nǐ zìjǐ bùlì. It won’t do you any good. 5 [indicating beginning or origin] from 黄河发源于青海。 Huáng Hé fā yuányú Qīnghǎi. The Yellow River rises in Qinghai Province. 认识来源于实践。 Rènshi láiyuányú shíjiàn. Knowledge comes from practice. 6 [indicating comparison] than 不少于五千人 Bù shǎoyú wǔqiān rén no less than 5,000 people 友谊贵于黄金。 Yǒuyì guì yú huángjīn. Friendship is more precious than gold. 金星略小于地球。 Jīnxīng lüè xiǎoyú dìqiú. Venus is a little smaller than the earth. 7 [indicating the doer of an action] by 见笑于人 Jiànxiào yú rén be laughed at (by others) 主队败于客队。 Zhǔduì bài yú kèduì. The home team was defeated by the visiting team. affix [after a verb or an adjective] 属于 shǔyú belong to 勇于 yǒngyú have the courage to; dare to 至于 zhìyú as for

pronoun self; oneself; one's own 自顾自 zìgùzì each for himself 自打耳光 zìdǎ ěrguāng slap one’s own face; contradict oneself adverb certainly; of course; naturally 自当努力 zì dāng nǔlì will certainly do one’s best 两人久别重逢, 自有许多话说。 Liǎng rén jiǔbiéchóngféng, zì yǒu xǔduō huà shuō. Naturally they had a lot to say to each other after such a long separation. 现在多用功, 将来自有好处。 Xiànzài duō yònggōng, jiānglái zì yǒu hǎochu. You will certainly benefit in the future from hard study now. 这电影部分情节自属有趣, 但终非佳片。 Zhè diànyǐng bùfen qíngjié zì shǔ yǒuqù, dàn zhōng fēi jiā piàn. Of course parts of the story are fun, but it’s not really a good film. preposition from; since 自远而近 zìyuǎn'érjìn from far to near; approach; come closer 自左而右 zì zuǒ ér yòu from left to right 自即日起生效 Zì jírì qǐ shēngxiào become effective (as) from this date; with effect from (w.e.f.) this date 自数十元至几千元不等 zì shù shí yuán zhì jǐqiān yuán bùděng range from tens to thousands of yuan 他自小在这儿长大。 Tā zì xiǎo zài zhèr zhǎngdà. He was brought up here. or He grew up here. 本次列车自北京开往南京。 Běn cì lièchē zì Běijīng kāi wǎng Nánjīng. This train runs from Beijing to Nanjing.

noun 1 textile warp (opp. 纬) 2 Chinese medicine channels 3 geography longitude (opp. 纬) 东经 dōngjīng east longitude 西经 xījīng west longitude 4 scripture; sutra; canon; classic 《孝经》 《Xiàojīng》 The Classic of Filial Piety 《金刚经》 《Jīngāngjīng》 The Diamond Sutra 5 menses; menstruation 6 (Jīng) a surname verb 1 literary manage; deal in; engage in 经国之策 jīng guó zhī cè a plan to govern the country 2 hang oneself See 36870400自经zi4jing1自经 adjective constant; regular 荒诞不经 huāngdànbùjīng preposterous; absurd verb 1 pass through; undergo; experience 经卡拉奇回国 Jīng kǎ lā qí huíguó return home via (or by way of) Karachi 赴沪途中经宁而未停留。 Fù Hù túzhōng jīng nìng ér wèi tíngliú. I passed through Nanjing on my way to Shanghai, but I didn’t stop over. 我这辈子可经了不少事。 Wǒ zhè bèizi kě jīng le bùshǎo shì. I have seen quite a lot in my life. 2 stand; bear; endure 经不起诱惑 jīng bùqǐ yòuhuò cannot withstand the temptations 经得起时间的考验 Jīngdeqǐ shíjiān de kǎoyàn stand the test of time preposition as a result of; after; through 经商定 jīng shāngdìng after consultation the decision was made 经某人建议 jīng mǒurén jiànyì upon sb.’s proposal 经检查, 产品质量合格。 Jīng jiǎnchá, chǎnpǐn zhìliàng hégé. Examination confirmed product quality was up to standard.

affix [suffix used in interogatives, pronouns and adverbs] affix [a syllable inserted in a line of a song for balance] 五月的花儿红呀么红似火。 Wǔyuè de huā'ér hóng ya me hóng sì huǒ. Red as fire are the flowers that bloom in May.

verb be the same as “鎚”同“锤”。 “chuí”tóng“chuí”. 鎚 is the same as 锤。 adjective same; alike; similar 同年级 tóng niánjí in the same grade adverb together; in common 和工人同吃同住同劳动 Hé gōngrén tóng chī tóng zhù tóng láodòng eat, live, and work with the workers; live with the workers, eat the same food, and join them in physical labour 我们两国同属第三世界。 Wǒmen liǎng guó tóng shǔ dì-sān shìjiè. Both our countries belong to the Third World. preposition 1 [indicating company, relationship, involvement, etc.] with 我同你一起去。 Wǒ tóng nǐ yīqǐ qù. I’ll go with you. 这同你没有关系。 Zhè tóng nǐ méiyǒu guānxi. This has nothing to do with you. 这件事同他有牵连。 Zhè jiàn shì tóng tā yǒu qiānlián. He is implicated in the affair. 2 [introducing the recipient of an action] 他同我商量下一步该怎么办。 Tā tóng wǒ shāngliang xià yī bù gāi zěnme bàn. He consulted me about what to do next. 他上午来同我告别。 tā shàngwǔ lái tóng wǒ gàobié. He came to say good-bye to me this morning. 3 [showing comparison] like; in relation to 同去年相比, 产量增加了20%。 tóng qùnián xiāngbǐ, chǎnliàng zēngjiā le 20%. Output has increased by 20% over last year. 湖面同明镜一样清澈。 Húmiàn tóng míngjìng yīyàng qīngchè. The limpid lake is like a mirror. 4 dialect for 别着急, 我同你想个办法。 Bié zháojí, wǒ tóng nǐ xiǎng ge bànfǎ. Don’t worry, I’ll find you a way out. 这封信我一直同你保存着。 Zhè fēng xìn wǒ yīzhí tóng nǐ bǎocúnzhe. I’ve kept this letter for you all this time. conjunction and 老师同学生 Lǎoshī tóng xuésheng teachers and students

verb 1 be in compliance (or accordance) with 这才如了大伙的意。 Zhè cái rú le dà huǒ de yì. Finally everybody was satisfied. 2 like; as; as if 如你所说 rú nǐ suǒ shuō as you’ve said 如离弦之箭 rú lí xián zhī jiàn like an arrow discharged from a bow 十年如一日 shí nián rú yī rì persevere for ten years as if it were one day 湖水如镜。 Húshuǐ rú jìng. The lake is like a mirror. 事情并不如他们所想的那样简单。 Shìqing bìng bù rú tāmen suǒ xiǎng de nàyàng jiǎndān. Things aren’t as simple as they think. 3 [usu. in the negative] can compare with; be as good as 不如 bùrú not equal to; not as good as; inferior to 4 surpass; exceed 光景一年强如一年。 Guāngjǐng yī nián qiáng rú yī nián. The situation is getting better year by year. 5 for instance; such as; as 唐朝有很多大诗人, 如李白, 杜甫, 白居易等。 Tángcháo yǒu hěn duō dà shīrén, rú Lǐ Bó, Dù Fǔ, Bái Jūyì děng. The Tang Dynasty produced a host of great poets, such as Li Bai, Du Fu, and Bai Juyi. 6 literary go to 如厕 rúcè go to the toilet preposition according to 如约前往 Rúyuē qiánwǎng go as one has promised conjunction if; in case (of); in the event of; as if; as though 如有火警, 将玻璃击碎。 Rú yǒu huǒjǐng, jiāng bōli jī suì. In case of fire, break the glass. [a notice] 如处理得当, 问题不难解决。 Rú chǔlǐ dédàng, wèntí bù nán jiějué. The problem will not be difficult to solve if properly handled. 如发生此种情况, 我们即诉诸法律。 Rú fāshēng cǐ zhǒng qíngkuàng, wǒmen jí sùzhū fǎlǜ. In that event, we would take the matter to court. affix classical [as an adjective suffix] 侃侃如也 Kǎnkǎn rú yě fervently eloquent

noun cash; ready money 付现 fùxiàn pay cash verb show; appear; become visible 现原形 xiàn yuánxíng show one’s true colours 她脸上现出一丝笑容。 Tā liǎnshàng xiànchū yī sī xiàoróng. A faint smile appeared on (or crept over) her face. adjective 1 present; current; existing 现况 xiànkuàng the existing (or present) situation 现阶段 xiànjiēduàn present stage 2 (of money, etc.) on hand See 32961024现钱xian4qian2现钱 adverb recent; improvise; extempore 现烙的烧饼 xiàn lào de shāobing sesame buns just out of the oven 现派张先生前往你处接洽。 xiàn pài zhāng xiānsheng qiánwǎng nǐ chù jiēqià. We are now sending Mr Zhang to contact you. 他在晚会上现编了一首诗。 Tā zài wǎnhuì shàng xiàn biān le yī shǒu shī. He improvised a poem at the evening party. 这点儿技术也是工作中现学的。 Zhèdiǎnr jìshù yěshì gōngzuò zhōng xiàn xué de. Whatever skills I have were picked up on the job.

verb 1 move; stir 他扭了腰, 动不了了。 Tā niǔ le yāo, dòng bù liǎoliǎo. He’s strained his back and can’t move. 微风吹动树叶。 Wēifēng chuīdòng shùyè. A breeze stirred the leaves. 这东西一个人拿不动。 Zhè dōngxi yī ge rén ná bù dòng. No one can carry that single-handed. or That’s too heavy for one person. 2 act; get moving 经过动员, 群众普遍动起来了。 Jīngguò dòngyuán, qúnzhòng pǔbiàn dòng qǐlai le. After being encouraged to action everyone got involved. 3 change; alter 这句话只要动一两个字就顺了。 Zhè jù huà zhǐ yào dòng yī liǎng ge zì jiù shùn le. Just change one or two words and the sentence will read smoothly. 4 use 动脑子 dòng nǎozi use one’s head 5 touch (one's heart); arouse 动感情 dòng gǎnqíng be carried away by emotion; get worked up; be moved 动了公愤 dòng le gōngfèn arouse public indignation 不为甜言蜜语所动 bù wéi tiányánmìyǔ suǒ dòng not swayed by fine words 6 dialect [usu. in the negative] eat or drink 不动荤腥 bù dòng hūnxīng never touch meat or fish; be a vegetarian adverb literary easily; frequently 影片一经上演, 观众动以万计。 Yǐngpiàn yījīng shàngyǎn, guānzhòng dòng yǐ wàn jì. Immediately on release, the film drew an audience of thousands.

noun 1 face 面带笑容 miàndài xiàoróng with a smile on one’s face 面无惧色 miàn wú jùsè look dauntless; fearless look 2 surface; top; face 钟面 zhōngmiàn clock face; dial 面儿磨得很光。 Miànr mó de hěn guāng. The surface has been polished shiny bright. 3 side 这种纸一面光。 Zhèzhǒng zhǐ yī miàn guāng. This kind of paper is smooth on one side. 这本书有多少面？ Zhè běn shū yǒu duōshao miàn？ How many pages are there in this book? 4 right side; cover; outside 书面儿 shūmiànr cover of a book 夹袄的面儿 jiá'ǎo de miànr outer shell of a lined jacket 这块布做里儿, 那块布做面儿。 Zhè kuài bù zuò lǐr, nà kuài bù zuò miànr. Use this piece of cloth for the lining and that piece for the outside. 5 mathematics surface 立方体有六个面。 Lìfāngtǐ yǒu liù ge miàn. A cube has six surfaces. 6 overall; entire area (as opposed to individual points) 部长下去蹲点儿了, 面上的工作他让我来抓。 Bùzhǎng xiàqu dūndiǎnr le, miàn shàng de gōngzuò tā ràng wǒ lái zhuā. The minister has gone to spend time in a grass-roots unit and left me in charge of overall business. 7 extent; range; scale; scope 知识面广 Zhīshi miàn guǎng have a wide range of knowledge 知识面窄 Zhīshimiàn zhǎi have a narrow range of knowledge 这次讨论涉及的面很广。 Zhè cì tǎolùn shèjí de miàn hěn guǎng. The discussion covered a wide range of topics. 8 face; feelings 看在我的面上, 饶了他这一回吧。 Kàn zài wǒ de miàn shàng, ráo le tā zhè yī huí ba. Please let him off this time for my sake. verb 1 meet; come out See 66915299面市mian4shi4面市 2 face (a certain direction) 这房子面南坐北。 Zhè fángzi miàn nán zuò běi. The house faces south. measure word 1 [for flat things] 一面镜子 yī miàn jìngzi a mirror 两面旗子 liǎng miàn qízi two flags 2 [for the number of times people meet each other] 我们只见过一面。 wǒmen zhǐjiàn guò yī miàn. We have only met once. affix [suffix for location or direction] 前面 qiánmiàn in front; at the head; ahead 外面 wàimiàn outside; out adverb directly; face-to-face 面告 miàngào tell sb. personally

verb 1 rise; get up; stand up 起席 qǐxí rise from the table 早睡早起 zǎoshuìzǎoqǐ early to bed and early to rise 2 remove; extract; pull 起雷 qǐléi clear mines 起油 qǐyóu remove grease stains 起钉子 qǐ dīngzi draw out a nail 起瓶塞 qǐ píngsāi pull the cork from a bottle 把画起下来 bǎ huà qǐ xiàlai take down a picture 3 appear; raise 脚上起水泡 jiǎo shàng qǐ shuǐpào get blisters on one’s feet 4 rise; grow 起疑心 qǐ yíxīn become suspicious 起作用 qǐ zuòyòng take effect 起风了。 Qǐ fēng le. The wind is rising. 5 draft; work out 起稿子 qǐ gǎozi work out (or make) a draft 6 build; set up 起伙 qǐ huǒ set up a mess 起一堵墙 qǐ yī dǔ qiáng build a wall 7 start; begin 从今天起 cóng jīntiān qǐ starting from today 8 draw; get 起护照 qǐ hùzhào get one’s passport 9 leave; start See 28173312起程qi3cheng2起程;28176896起飞qi3fei1 起飞 10 move (or rise) up 这球不起了。 Zhè qiú bù qǐ le. There is no spring left in this ball. or The ball doesn’t bounce. 11 to start; to launch See 28171776起兵qi3bing1起兵;28188160起事qi3shi4 起事 preposition 1 [after a verb preceded by 从 or 由] 从头儿讲起 cóng tóu'ér jiǎng qǐ tell the story from the very beginning 从何说起？ Cóng hé shuō qǐ？ What shall I say? or What’s there to say? 2 dialect from 起这儿往北 qǐ zhèr wǎng běi go north from here 3 dialect by 我见他起窗外走过。 Wǒ jiàn tā qǐ chuāngwài zǒuguò. I saw him going by the window. noun (Qǐ) a surname measure word 1 case; instance 一起交通事故 Yī qǐ jiāotōng shìgù a traffic accident 两起大脑炎 Liǎng qǐ dànǎoyán two cases of cerebritis 2 batch; group 分两起出发 fēn liǎng qǐ chūfā set out in two groups (or batches)

verb 1 decide; fix; set 定方针 Dìng fāngzhēn decide on a policy 定计划 dìng jìhuà make a plan 开会时间定在明天上午。 Kāihuì shíjiān dìng zài míngtiān shàngwǔ. The meeting is fixed for tomorrow morning. 代表团定于今日离京。 Dàibiǎotuán dìngyú jīnrì lí jīng. The delegation is due to leave Beijing today. 2 subscribe to (a newspaper, etc.); book (seats, tickets, hotel rooms, etc.); order (merchandise, etc.) adjective 1 calm; stable 天下大定。 Tiānxià dà dìng. The country is generally calm. 2 fixed; settled; established See 20153600定见ding4jian4定见 adverb literary surely; certainly; definitely 定可取胜 dìng kě qǔshèng be sure to win; victory is certain; sure to prevail
1 day 2 sky 3 heaven

adverb 1 still; yet 还有一些具体问题要解决。 Háiyǒu yīxiē jùtǐ wèntí yào jiějué. Some specific problems have yet to be solved. 我们还没有开始。 Wǒmen hái méiyǒu kāishǐ. We haven’t started yet. 夜深了, 他还在学习。 Yèshēn le, tā hái zài xuéxí. It was late at night and he was still studying. 2 even more; still more 今年的收成比去年还要好。 Jīnnián de shōucheng bǐ qùnián hái yào hǎo. This year’s harvest is even better than last year’s. 3 as well; in addition 我们不但要提高产量, 还要保证质量。 Wǒmen bùdàn yào tígāo chǎnliàng, hái yào bǎozhèng zhìliàng. We want not only to increase the quantity of products, but also to ensure the quality. 这本书我还想看一遍。 Zhè běn shū wǒ hái xiǎng kàn yī biàn. I want to read the book once more. 4 passably; fairly 屋子不大, 收拾得倒还干净。 Wūzi bùdà, shōushi de dào hái gānjìng. The room is small, but it’s kept quite tidy. 这张画儿画得还可以。 Zhè zhāng huàr huà de hái kěyǐ. The painting wasn’t done too badly. or This painting’s not very bad. 5 as early as 还在三年前他们就认识了。 hái zài sān niánqián tāmen jiù rènshi le. They got to know each other three years ago. 他还在读中学时就开始写小说。 Tā hái zài dú zhōngxué shí jiù kāishǐ xiě xiǎoshuō. He started to write novels when he was in middle school. 6 even 你跑那么快还赶不上他, 何况我呢？ Nǐ pǎo nàme kuài hái gǎnbùshàng tā, hékuàng wǒ ne? Even a good runner like you can’t catch up with him, how can I? 7 [for emphasis] 那还用说！ Nà hái yòng shuō! That goes without saying. 这还了得！ Zhè hái liǎode! This is the limit! or This is simply atrocious! 8 [expressing realization or discovery] 他还真有办法。 Tā hái zhēn yǒu bànfǎ. You’ve got to admit he’s resourceful. or He really is resourceful. 下这么大的雨, 没想到你还真准时到了。 Xià zhème dà de yǔ, méi xiǎngdào nǐ hái zhēn zhǔnshí dàoliǎo. I didn’t expect you’d arrive on time as it’s raining so hard.

noun 1 part; section 南部 nánbù the southern part 上部 shàngbù upper part 分为三部 Fēnwéi sān bù divide into three parts (or sections) 2 unit; ministry; department; board 解放军某部 jiěfàngjūn mǒu bù a PLA unit 3 headquarters 连部 liánbù company headquarters 4 troops; forces 率部突围 shuàibù tūwéi lead the troops to break through an encirclement measure word 1 [for books, films, etc.] 两部字典 liǎng bù zìdiǎn two dictionaries 一部电影 yī bù diànyǐng a film 2 [for machines and vehicles] 两部汽车 liǎng bù qìchē two cars 一部机器 yī bù jīqì a machine verb literary command; lead 部领 bù lǐng command

literary pronoun 1 his (her, its, their) 其父 Qí fù his (or her) father 《战国策》取其灵快。 《Zhàn Guócè》 qǔ qí líng kuài. Intrigues of the Warring States is noted for its agility of thought and expressiveness of style. 2 he (she, it, they) 劝其戒烟 Quàn qí jièyān advise him (or her) to give up smoking 促其早日实现 cù qí zǎorì shíxiàn help bring it about at an early date 3 that; such 正当其时 zhèngdāng qíshí just at that time; at the opportune moment 查无其事。 Chá wú qí shì. Investigation shows that nothing of this sort has happened. 4 [referring to no definite person or thing] it 大请其客 Dà qǐng qí kè invite many guests to dinner; entertain lavishly 忘其所以 wàngqísuǒyǐ forget all else noun (Qí) a surname auxiliary classical 1 [making a guess or a retort] 其奈我何？ Qínàiwǒhé？ What can they do to me? 2 [giving an order] 子其勉之！ Zǐ qí miǎn zhī! Exert yourself to the utmost! affix [after an adverb] 极其 jíqí extremely 尤其 yóuqí in particular

noun 1 host (opp. 客, 宾) 宾主 bīnzhǔ host and guest 2 owner; master (opp. 仆) 主仆 zhǔ-pú master and servant 企业主 qǐyè zhǔ proprietor of an enterprise; business owner 3 person or party concerned 买主 mǎizhǔ buyer; customer 事主 shìzhǔ victim of a crime 4 Christianity God; Lord 5 Islam Allah 6 definite view; decision 我一时心里没主。 Wǒ yīshí xīnli méi zhǔ. For a moment, I just didn’t know what to do. 7 spirit (or memorial) tablet 神主 shénzhǔ ancestral tablet verb 1 manage; direct; in charge of See 36559616主管zhu3guan3主管 2 indicate; signify 早霞主雨, 晚霞主晴。 Zǎo xiá zhǔ yǔ, wǎnxiá zhǔ qíng. Rosy morning clouds indicate rain, and a rosy sunset means fine weather. 3 advocate; decide 力主和平 Lì zhǔ hépíng advocate strongly for peace adjective 1 main; primary (opp. 副) 主航道 zhǔhángdào main (or principal) channel 2 of oneself; on one's own will See 36553728主动zhu3dong4主动;36558592主观zhu3guan1主观

noun 1 appearance; shape; look; form 这两支笔样儿差不多, 色儿不一样。 Zhè liǎng zhī bǐ yàngr chàbuduō, sèr bù yīyàng. These two pens are alike except that they’re different colours. 2 manner; air; appearance 几年没见, 他还是那个样儿。 Jǐ nián méi jiàn, tā háishi nà ge yàngr. It’s years since I last saw him, but he still looks the same. 3 sample; model; pattern 鞋样 xiéyàng shoe pattern; outline of a shoe’s upper and sole 4 tendency; likelihood 看样儿要下雨了。 kàn yàng r yào xiàyǔ le. It looks like rain. measure word kind; type 三样点心 Sān yàng diǎnxin three kinds of pastries 商店虽小, 各样货物俱全。 Shāngdiàn suī xiǎo, gèyàng huòwù jùquán. Small as it is, the shop stocks all kinds of wares.

noun 1 texture; grain (in wood, skin, etc.) 木理 mùlǐ grain of wood 2 order; sequence 条理 tiáolǐ orderliness; proper arrangement 3 reason; logic; truth 讲理 jiǎnglǐ listen to reason; talk sense 没理 méilǐ be unreasonable 有理 yǒulǐ be on the right 不讲理 bù jiǎnglǐ lose all reason; be not amenable to reason 他讲得在理。 tā jiǎng de zài lǐ. There is truth in what he says. 4 natural science (esp. physics) 理学院 lǐxuéyuàn college of science 文理兼通 Wén lǐ jiāntōng be knowledgeable in both arts and sciences verb 1 manage; run 有要事待理 yǒu yàoshì dài lǐ have important business to attend to 2 put in order; tidy up 理出头绪 lǐchū tóuxù straighten a matter out 把书理一下。 bǎ shū lǐ yīxià. Put the books in order. 把房间理一理。 Bǎ fángjiān lǐ yī lǐ. Straighten up the room. 3 [usu. in the negative] pay attention to; make a gesture or speak to 不理 bùlǐ take no notice of; pay no attention to 谁也不理谁 Shuí yě bù lǐ shuí be not on speaking terms 他想跟我讲话, 我没理他。 Tā xiǎng gēn wǒ jiǎnghuà, wǒ méi lǐ tā. I ignored him when he tried to talk to me.

noun 1 heart 2 heart; mind; feeling; intention 伤人的心 shāng rén de xīn wound (or hurt) sb.’s feelings 羞耻之心 xiūchǐzhīxīn sense of shame 你的心是好的, 但事情办得不好。 Nǐ dexīn shì hǎo de, dàn shìqing bàn de bù hǎo. You meant well but you didn’t handle the job well. 他人在这儿, 但心不在。 Tārén zài zhèr, dàn xīn bùzài. He himself is here, but his thoughts are elsewhere. 3 centre; core 江心 jiāngxīn the middle of a river; halfway across the river 白菜心 Báicài xīn the heart of a Chinese cabbage 4 archaic astronomy xin (the fifth of the twenty-eight constellations (二十八宿) into which the celestial sphere was divided, consisting of three stars in Scorpio)

noun 1 front (opp. 后) 前院 qiányuàn front courtyard 楼前 lóu qián in front of the building 将军胸前戴着所有的勋章。 Jiāngjun xiōngqián dàizhe suǒyǒu de xūnzhāng. The general was wearing all his medals on his chest. 2 future See 28323072前程qian2cheng2前程 3 ago; before (opp. 后) 晚饭前 Wǎn fànqián before supper 这个故事发生在五百年前。 Zhège gùshi fāshēng zài wǔbǎi nián qián. The story took place 500 years ago. 4 forward; ahead (opp. 后) 朝前走 Cháo qián zǒu go straight ahead 往前看 wǎng qián kàn look forward 5 preceding 前一阶段 qián yī jiēduàn the preceding stage 前资本主义 qián zīběnzhǔyì precapitalism 6 former; formerly 前任校长 Qiánrèn xiàozhǎng former principal (of a school) 7 first (opp. 后) 前五排 qián wǔ pái the first five rows 这次比赛的前三名 Zhècì bǐsài de qián sān míng the first three places in this competition 8 front; battlefield 支前 zhīqián support the front 9 (Qián) a surname verb move forward; go (straight) ahead 勇往直前 yǒngwǎngzhíqián forge ahead bravely

conjunction but; yet; still; nevertheless 这消息可能出乎意料, 但却是真实的。 Zhè xiāoxi kěnéng chūhū yìliào, dàn què shì zhēnshí de. The news may be unexpected; nevertheless, it is true. adverb only; merely 明哲保身, 但求无过。 míngzhébǎoshēn, dànqiúwúguò Being worldly-wise, play safe and seek only to avoid blame.

noun cause; reason (opp. 果) 起因 qǐyīn cause; origin 必有他因 bì yǒu tā yīn there must be some other reason verb literary 1 follow; carry on See 34679040因袭yin1xi2因袭 2 conform to; accord with 因病下药 yīnbìngxiàyào suit the medicine to the illness 因其自然 yīn qí zìrán let things take their natural course preposition because of; as a result of 因病请假 yīn bìng qǐngjià ask for sick leave 因公死亡 yīngōng sǐwáng work-related death 因公牺牲 yīngōng xīshēng die while on duty; die at one’s post 会议因故延期。 Huìyì yīngù yánqī. The meeting has been postponed for some reason. conjunction because 他因有其他事情未能出席。 Tā yīn yǒu qítā shìqing wèinéng chūxí. He was absent because he had other things to attend to.

noun 1 reality; fact 名不副实 míngbùfùshí the name falls short of the reality; more in name than in reality; not live up to its name 2 fruit; seed 开花结实 Kāihuā jiēshí blossom and bear fruit adjective 1 solid 地基要砸实。 Dìjī yào zá shí. The foundations must be tamped solid. 里面是实的。 Lǐmiàn shì shí de. It’s solid. 2 true; real; actual (opp. 虚) See 70593763实利shi2li4实利 adverb literary really; truly 实感悲伤 shí gǎn bēishāng feel really sad
